# About Me

Ellie Spangler is a dual Political Science and Economics major at Macalester College with a minor in Data Science. With a strong academic record and hands-on experience, she has interned at organizations such as the American Federation of Teachers and the Office of U.S. Senator Tina Smith, contributing to research, policy analysis, and advocacy. Ellie is passionate about the intersection of technology, economics and social policy, using her skills in Python and R Studio to pursue data-driven policy development.
